## Introduction

This chapter is intended as a starting place for getting started with R, geospatial data types, and/or common health data types. This chapter provides brief descriptions of introductory concepts with links to resources, such as textbooks and tutorials, that support further exploration.

The following resoures cover related topics: 

- CAFE
- IPUMS
- TAME Toolkit

## Getting Started with R

The [TAME Toolkit](https://uncsrp.github.io/Data-Analysis-Training-Modules/) provides resources for getting started with `R` for environmental health research. Additionally, the book [*Geocomputation with R*](https://r.geocompx.org/) provides resources for geospatial data analysis with `R`.
